name: hibed
0:

”Alexa, set mood SLEEP on my bed”

Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the hibed skill for Alexa you can interact with your hibed, a smart bed produced by hi-interiors company, just using voice command. Turn off and on your hibed, turn off and on the projector, turn off and on the lights and set a scenario to choose the mood.
To get started, sign in to hi-interiors app with your account and connect to your hibed. then "Enable Skill" in the Alexa app and sign in with the same hi-interiors account. Your hibed will be automatically linked.
Now ask Alexa to turn on the lights on your hibed
